tips: Salt detox baths are usually made of Epsom salt, which allows for minerals to "draw out" toxins from the body. Supporters may claim that soaking in an Epsom salt bath can remove harmful toxins and balance the body. Salt Detox Bath Recipe is very simple to add ¼ cup sea salt or Himalayan salt, ¼ cup Epsom salt, ¼ cup baking soda, 1/3 cup apple cider vinegar, Essential oils (10 drops of lavender or any). And you are ready for a salt detox.
title: Detox Bath

tips: Sleep plays an important role in your physical health. For example, sleep is involved in the healing and repair of your heart and blood vessels. Insufficient sleep is related to some serious health problems, such as heart disease, heart attacks, diabetes and obesity.

Iron is necessary for producing hemoglobin and myoglobin, two proteins that carry oxygen in your blood. You can usually prevent iron deficiency by consuming the right amount of iron in your diet.
SOURCES: Meat, poultry, legumes, oysters, tuna, pork, nuts, dark green vegetables, tomato juice, and potatoes are all good sources of dietary iron.
